nodes.text: There's no sign that the Thief went through this door. It's still locked, and the handle isn't sticky.
Having an infirmary right next to the Dining Hall was probably intentional.

nodes.message: Terk does not patrol on days with certain events

nodes.text: Nothing. This is getting boring.
I hear someone in there. The Infirmary must be open for the holidays.
Let's see if I can hear anything now...
I don't hear anything in the Infirmary right now. That's probably a good thing. It's better than some holiday emergency where someone got hurt.
I hear someone in there. The Infirmary must be open for the holidays.
With Terk snooping around, this is probably not a good time to practice my listening skills.
I already know someone's in there. This is getting boring.
Let's see if I can hear anything now...
I can hear someone moving around in there, but not much else.
I already know nobody's there. This is getting boring.
Let's see if I can hear anything now...
Nothing. Everyone must be gone for the night.
I already know nobody's there. This is getting boring.
Let's see if I can hear anything now...
All I hear is Terk on patrol... I'd better get away before he catches me.
What's that noise?
Conner! It's past curfew. Five demerits - and go to your room!
I already know nobody's there. This is getting boring.
Let's see if I can hear anything now...
I guess no one's in the Infirmary right now. That's probably a good thing. It's better than some late night emergency where someone got hurt.
I already know nobody's there. This is getting boring.
Let's see if I can hear anything now...
I guess no one's in the infirmary. Glad no one's sick on a free day.
The door's locked.
I can't pick the lock without a lockpick!
This isn't the best place to practice lockpicking.
Got it!
I can't pick the lock.
